pt_cs_translator.name: 普通话-潮汕话翻译器 (PT-CS Translator)
pt_cs_translator.description: 普通话是中国政府推行的统一语言，而潮汕话是广东潮汕地区独有的方言，使用人数大概为1000万人。PT-CS Translator模型利用机器学习实现了普通话和潮汕话的互译，来帮助潮汕地区不识字的人们平等接收信息。
pt_cs_translator.description_en: PuTongHua is the standard language in China, while ChaoShanHua, a unique dialect in ChaoShan Region, Guangdong Province, is widely spoken by about 10 millions residents. PT-CS Translator translates two different languages between PuTongHua and ChaoShanHua, faciliating Machine Learning to help illiterate people with equal right for information.

starganv2_afhq.name: Pretrained StarGANv2 model on AFHQ
starganv2_afhq.description: This model can be used to translate animal faces.
